text: Raghunandan Lal Bhatia (3 July 1921 - 14 May 2021) was an Indian politician. He was the Governor of Kerala from 23 June 2004 to 10 July 2008 and was the Governor of Bihar from 10 July 2008 to 28 June 2009."R.S. Gavai is new Kerala Governor", The Hindu, 27 June 2008. He was born in Amritsar, Punjab. Bhatia was first elected to the Lok Sabha in 1972. He was a member of the Indian National Congress."New Governor R. L. Bhatia Sworn-in" , PatnaDaily.com, 10 July 2008. Bhatia retired in 2009. Bhatia died from COVID-19 at a hospital in Amritsar on 14 May 2021, less than two months before he turned 100.Ex-Union minister RL Bhatia dies of Covid-19 in Amritsar ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Governors of Kerala Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: R. L. Bhatia
